document.full_text: the coast guard partially reopened a 9-mile (14.48-km) section of the  flooding mississippi river near baton rouge, which had been shut since friday following the sinking of three barges, a spokesman said monday afternoon.
document.title: coast guard partially reopens mississippi
lines_and_colors: the coast guard partially reopened a 9-mile (14.48-km) section of the  flooding mississippi river near baton rouge, which had been shut since friday following the sinking of three barges, a spokesman said monday afternoon.
